meanings.definition: The quality or state of being round in shape.
meanings.sent1: The rotundness of the ball made it perfect for rolling.
meanings.sent2: The rotundness of the moon in the sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The rotundness of the snowball grew as the children rolled it down the hill.
meanings.sent4: The rotundness of the earth is often compared to a blue marble in space.
meanings.sent5: The rotundness of the watermelon made it difficult to slice evenly.

meanings.definition: The condition of being plump or chubby.
meanings.sent1: Her rotundness made her a huggable teddy bear.
meanings.sent2: The rotundness of the baby's cheeks was adorable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his rotundness, he was surprisingly agile on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The rotundness of the cat made it look like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent5: The rotundness of the squirrel showed it had been enjoying plenty of nuts.
